Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: a potato
  • Memory: 200 MB RAM
  • Graphics: another potato
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: if the one that comes with the $200 laptop my sister bought works, I'm sure you'll be just fine
  • Additional Notes: Okay this is an actual note, this game is best optimized for 1080p 16:9 displays. The game will function just fine on other displays, of course, but the pixel art can get a bit distorted on other resolutions.

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac Os Ventura
  • Processor: Apple M1
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
